# Globals.UnitConvert method

Performs unit conversion

```csharp
public double UnitConvert(double value, string from, string to)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| value | Value to convert |
| from | source unit |
| to | target unit |

## Return Value

value converted to target unit
